1189020.name: LOGA: Unexpected Adventure
1189020.description:
Dive in a world of fun and exciting times , and help our hero find his lost mother ,loga, a cute creature made from cloth , he began his journey with a broken heart and no answers , yet he will do anything to for his mother and bring her back , he knows it’s very difficult task ,but together you and him , will always find a way through , during the journey loga and you will face more than 30 extremely hard levels , these levels designed to break the bravest of them all , but everytime loga thinking about giving up , he feels a sting comes from the bottom of his heart , tilling him his mother needs him , and he is her only hope

Key Features


  • - beautiful and stunning sceneries ,but extremely difficult
  • - indie game made by only one man
  • - more than 30 challenging levels
  • - the only options are Jump and Run or Die
1189020.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
